tool_description: Checks real-time availability of emergency response units including ambulances, paramedics, and specialized equipment within specified radius.

resource_type.description: Resource needed: als_ambulance, bls_ambulance, fire_rescue, supervisor

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180
Invalid resource type: Use als_ambulance, bls_ambulance, fire_rescue, or supervisor
Invalid priority level: Must be integer between 1 and 5
Search radius too large: Maximum radius is 50 miles
No resources available: All units in specified radius are currently assigned
usage: Provide location coordinates, resource type, and priority to find available emergency response units.

unit_distances.description: Distance in miles for each available unit
